{"step_by_step_thinking": "PCOD stands for Polycystic Ovarian Disease, a common cause of infertility in women. The documents mention several drugs used in the treatment of PCOD, including Clomiphene, Metformin, and OCPs (Oral Contraceptive Pills). However, Tamoxifen is not mentioned in the context of PCOD treatment. Tamoxifen is typically used in the treatment of breast cancer, not PCOD.", "answer_choice": "B. Tamoxifen"}
